hero.name: Isaac Suazo.

hero.description: I'm a software engineer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I'm focused on building accessible, human-centered products at

about.heading: About Me
paragraphs: Hello! My name is Isaac and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back in 2012 when I decided to try editing custom Tumblr themes â€” turns out hacking together a custom reblog button taught me a lot about HTML & CSS!
Fast-forward to today, and I've had the privilege of working at {links}. My main focus these days is building accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences.

contact.heading: Get In Touch
contact.description: Although I'm not currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
